sentences.en: Aston Villa last led the League in March 1990.
sentences.cn: 阿斯顿维拉队上一次赢得联赛冠军是在1990年3月。

sentences.en: He guested for one or two League sides.
sentences.cn: 他在一两支联赛队伍中做过外援。

sentences.en: he is &B{in league with} the devil.
sentences.cn: 他与魔鬼勾结。

sentences.en: He makes his football league debut tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天他将在足球联赛中首次出战。

sentences.en: Her success has taken her out of my league.
sentences.cn: 她的成绩令我望尘莫及。

sentences.en: His pitching was a legend among major league hitters.
sentences.cn: 他的投球在大联盟的击球员中是个传奇。

sentences.en: In Rugby League, Australia trounced France by sixty points to four.
sentences.cn: 在联盟橄榄球赛上，澳大利亚队以60：4的比分大胜法国队。

sentences.en: Northampton were third in the League placings.
sentences.cn: 北安普敦在联赛中名列第三。

sentences.en: Over the past year, the company has joined the big league.
sentences.cn: 去年一年中，公司已跻身一流之列。

sentences.en: Scottish football would be subsumed by a British League.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰足球将被纳入某个英国足球联赛。

sentences.en: The Belgians took over Rwanda under a League of Nations mandate.
sentences.cn: 比利时人依照国际联盟的授权接管了卢旺达。

sentences.en: The club are on the brink of promotion to the Premier League.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部即将晋级超级联赛。

sentences.en: the National Socialist League
sentences.cn: 国家社会主义联盟

sentences.en: The New England team are the worst in the league.
sentences.cn: 新英格兰队是联盟中最差的队。

sentences.en: the Rugby League Championship
sentences.cn: 橄榄球联合会锦标赛

sentences.en: the Rugby League Championship
sentences.cn: 橄榄球联合会锦标赛

sentences.en: The team is close to bottom of the League.
sentences.cn: 这支球队快跌至联赛末席了。

sentences.en: This merely strengthens our resolve to win the league.
sentences.cn: 这只会更加坚定我们赢得联赛的决心。

sentences.en: Thus the first workers' league came into being.
sentences.cn: 第一个工人联盟就这样诞生了。

sentences.en: United were league champions last season.
sentences.cn: 联队是上个赛季的联赛冠军。

sentences.en: We're bottom of the league and we have to get stuck in.
sentences.cn: 我们是联赛的最后一名，所以我们必须拼命赶超。

phrases.tran_cn: 美国联盟（美国棒球联赛）
阿拉伯联盟（全称League of Arab States）
长春藤联盟；长春藤名牌大学
职业体协；职业性运动联盟

trans.tran_cn: 联盟，社团，（运动）联合会、联赛，里格（长度单位，约等于 3 英里）
trans.tran_en: a group of sports teams or players who play games against each other to see who is best
